long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the potential of Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) with Street View Tracker, a powerful Chrome extension designed for investigators, researchers, and enthusiasts alike. Seamlessly integrate Google Street View with your research, allowing you to visualize exactly which streets you have been down before! 

Key Features:
Coordinate Tracking: Effortlessly capture and save geographic coordinates as you explore Google Street View. Perfect for mapping locations during investigations or research projects.

KML File Support: Download your collected coordinates in KML format for easy integration with mapping applications or GIS tools.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design makes it simple to navigate, whether you’re an experienced investigator or new to OSINT.

File Upload Capability: Load existing KML files into the extension to manage and analyze previously collected data efficiently.
